title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union sergeant's uniform and forage cap in front of painted backdrop showing American flag] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union sergeant's uniform and forage cap in front of painted backdrop showing American flag] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : ninth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 7.3 x 6.0 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff.
